name: Nolenopo 2D: Fight the zombies
description:
You spawn in a 2D world which is randomly generated. The goal is to kill as many monsters as you can before death.

If you spawn in a world with >25% water or not near a major body of land, I recommend restarting (reload the page)

Game world is 200 blocks side-to-side.

You can build to any height, but keep in mind that higher builds will prohibit you from killing monsters, which is the goal

This was my comp-sci final for school.
